name: view_all_food_items
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ind_nutrient_api.
Tool description: This API provides users with nutritional information for Indian foods. Users can retrieve a list of Indian dishes with their corresponding nutritional values, including the number of calories, the amount of protein, fat, and carbohydrates in grams.

Base URL: 

Authorization-free integration: Follow the endpoint definitions to seamlessly integrate the Ind Nutrients API into your app for accessing Indian nutrient data without any authentication requirements.

Base URL: https://indnutrientsapi....
API description: The request allows clients to retrieve a comprehensive list of all available food items.

API request sent to [https://indnutrientsapi.tech/food](https://indnutrientsapi.tech/food)

limit.description: The maximum number of food items to retrieve. Defaults to 10.
